archimate:Capability.name: Operation Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to define, instantiate, run, monitor, report on, control, secure, and evaluate an orchestration of jobs, tasks, and work to achieve a specific objective such as creating or delivering value constrained by time and location.

properties.value: Ability to define, instantiate, run, monitor, report on, control, secure, and evaluate an orchestration of jobs, tasks, and work to achieve a specific objective such as creating or delivering value constrained by time and location.
